column5: Hey guys I'm heading to North Bay with the family next weekend, was hoping to get out ice fishing for one of the days and was wondering if you know or recommend a operator with a daily hut rental I know there are lots of bungalow operators but only need it for the day, thanks.
If you don't mind traveling to the south shore there are lots of options.  Almost all of the operators that offer bungalows also have day huts.  The Waltonian would be my number one pick.
Reeds outdoor Adventures are also a pleasure to deal with and they have day huts. Next weekend will be crazy busy for all operators so book now!
I'll second Reeds.  They launch out of Sunset Park in North Bay.  I was there in  a bugalow about ten days ago and the fishing was very good for perch and slot walleyes.
